def covfefe(s):
    return s.replace("coverage","covfefe") if "coverage" in s else s+" covfefe"

def covfefe(s):
    return "".join(s.replace("coverage", "covfefe") if "coverage" in s else s + " covfefe")
covfefe = lambda s: s.replace("coverage", "covfefe") if "coverage" in s else s + " covfefe"

def covfefe(s):
    return s.replace('coverage', 'covfefe') if s.__contains__('coverage') else s + ' covfefe'

def covfefe(s):
    return (lambda cv,cf:(s+[f' {cv}',''][cv in s]).replace(cv,cf))('coverage', "covfefe")

def covfefe(s):
    lst = list(s.split(" "))
    result = ["covfefe" if i == "coverage" else i for i in lst]
    return " ".join(result) if "coverage" in lst else " ".join(result) + " covfefe"

def covfefe(stg):
    return stg.replace("coverage", "covfefe") if ("coverage" in stg) else f"{stg} covfefe"
